lead_paragraph: An intensive investigation of a mysterious annual epidemic in northern India in which thousands of young children suffer convulsions, lapse into comas and die has concluded that a toxin found in lychee fruit may be the cause.
snippet: An intensive investigation of a mysterious annual epidemic in northern India in which thousands of young children suffer convulsions, lapse into comas and die has concluded that a toxin found in lychee fruit may be the cause.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: India: Investigation Finds Clues to a Mysterious Illness
headline.print_headline: India: Investigation Finds Clues to a Mysterious Illness
